CommandLineTool.Name: UriToFile
CommandLineTool.Description: Download the specified Uri and output the file.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are written to Console.Write(...)

CommandLineTool.Name: CsvToXml
CommandLineTool.Description: Convert a CSV into an Xml file.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .xml

CommandLineTool.Name: XmlToJson
CommandLineTool.Description: Convert an Xml file into a Json file.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .json

CommandLineTool.Name: JsonToJs
CommandLineTool.Description: Convert a Json file into a JS file. Adds var filename = + json.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .js

CommandLineTool.Name: JsonToXml
CommandLineTool.Description: Convert a Json file to an Xml file.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .xml

CommandLineTool.Name: XsdFromXml
CommandLineTool.Description: Derive an Xsd from an Xml file.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .xsd

CommandLineTool.Name: XsltProc
CommandLineTool.Description: Process an Xml file given the specified Xslt file.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are written to Console.Write(...)

CommandLineTool.Name: FileSetToFiles
CommandLineTool.Description: Extract the files (and their contents) from an Xml File Set.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are created as multiple files as specified by the <RelativePath>...</RelativePath> fields of the FileSet.

CommandLineTool.Name: MSSQLDbToXml
CommandLineTool.Description: Extract an entire Database into a single XML file.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are written to Console.Write(...)

CommandLineTool.Name: HtmlToXml
CommandLineTool.Description: Interpret html (liberally) to create a valid xhtml document.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are written to Console.Write(...)

CommandLineTool.Name: XsdToOdxml
CommandLineTool.Description: Convert an XSD into an ODXML file, which powers the ODXML4 stack.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .odxml

CommandLineTool.Name: OdxmlToSqlSchema
CommandLineTool.Description: Converts an Odxml object model into a SQL script which will create that database structure
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .sql

CommandLineTool.Name: OdxmlToUpdateSqlSchema
CommandLineTool.Description: Convers an Odxml object model into a SQL script which will 'fill in the gaps' in a sql data model - if it already exists for the most part. Tables will not be added.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .sql

CommandLineTool.Name: StaticDataToUpdateInsertSqlData
CommandLineTool.Description: Moves static data (from a spec doc set) into a sql data base created to match the structure
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .sql

CommandLineTool.Name: GetSqlSchema
CommandLineTool.Description: Connect to a SQL Server and extract the database objects as one, large xml document.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .xml

CommandLineTool.Name: SqlSchemaToOdxml
CommandLineTool.Description: Convert the Xml produced by the GetSqlSchema tool, into an Odxml object model.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .odxml

CommandLineTool.Name: MultiLinqualObjectListToResx
CommandLineTool.Description: Convert a list of objects (with multiple languages for DisplayName + Description, to create multiple language files (resx and cs)
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + ._multiple

CommandLineTool.Name: MultiLinqualPropertyListToResx
CommandLineTool.Description: Convert a list of object properties / attributes (with multiple languages for DisplayName + Description, to create multiple language files (resx and cs)
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + ._multiple

CommandLineTool.Name: MultiLinqualTokenListToResx
CommandLineTool.Description: Convert a list of tokens (with multiple languages for DisplayName + Description, to create multiple language files (resx and cs)
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + ._multiple

CommandLineTool.Name: OdxmlToOdxmlSubset
CommandLineTool.Description: Trim down an Odxml Data model to a much smaller list of objects and/or properties.
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .odxml

CommandLineTool.Name: OdxmlCleanup
CommandLineTool.Description: Applys a mapping from one odxml model to another
CommandLineTool.Result: Results are saved to a file with the same name as input file + .odxml
